name: Kicking Stick
description:
Great for the huggers and the kickers. The catnip stick is made of hand-printed organic cotton canvas and filled with 70% premium catnip and 30% organic cotton fill. 

All of our fabrics are designed and printed in the Kitty Jones studio in Long Island City, Queens, NY. We use water-based ink and print in very small runs. When you purchase a Kitty Jones Kicking Stick you are investing in a high quality, hand-crafted toy made with sensitivity and respect for the environment.

Thanks!

name: Felted Wool Ball
description:
100% natural wool ball. Great for chasers and lazy bones alike. 

 Felted individually by hand, using unscented soap to retain their wooliness, these balls are a natural  alternative to plastic and rubber toys. Cats love the scent of wool and these vibrant balls are soft, bouncy and lightweight so they can be carried and pushed around with ease. Washable + durable + all natural = long life, less waste, more fun. 

Each one is approximately the size of a ping pong ball.  Price is per ball.

fun fact: washing not only cleans these little gems, it helps to re-felt the wool. The balls will never unravel but the hot water and soap encourages the fibers to shrink making it bouncier and even more exciting. Please use fragrance free soap to retain the natural scent.

name: Catnip Mouse
description:
The kitty jones catnip mouse was the first item in our line. We designed it to be intoxicating and adorable. Made of hand-printed organic canvas and filled with 100% premium catnip. No filler. Measures approximately 4 inches with felt ears and a four inch natural jute tail.

All of our fabrics are designed and printed in the Kitty Jones studio in Long Island City, Queens, NY. We use water-based ink and print in very small runs. When you purchase a Kitty Jones mouse you are investing in a high quality, hand-crafted toy made with sensitivity and respect for the environment.


Thanks!

name: kitty grass kit
description:
Peachbunny, the kitty jones mascot and muse, lives in new york city. He's an indoor guy. When we visit family in Pennsylvania he enjoys an afternoon, or two, relaxing on the porch. I imagine he dreams of lazing in the warm Summer sun, delighting in the brightness of fresh grass as it passes over his palate. He deserves a shot of wheatgrass just as much as the next guy so I made this planter for him. Not only does kitty grass aid in digestion, this kit, a glass jar some pretty stones and bright green grass, complements any decor, brings a bit of the outdoors in and offers a lovely lesson in irrigation.

The glass jar is 6 inches tall by 3 inches in diameter. Each kit includes a packet of seeds sufficient for two plantings. Seeds germinate in 3-5 days and each planting lasts up to 4-6  weeks, with attention. Keep grass in a sunlit area, trim to 3-4 inches tall and water regularly.

see thumbnails for alternate views

name: Scratch Pad
description:
Designed to be a piece of furniture that you want your cat to scratch -- this is a cleaned up, stylish cure for the common cat scratcher. 

The scratcher is big enough to use as a lounger and sturdy enough to provide hours of scratching fun. It is made from 100% recycled cardboard and hand-rolled around a wooden center. It is wrapped in organic cotton canvas that has been printed, by hand, with water-based ink. Made in the USA. 

diameter: 17 inches  height: 3 inches

We're sorry but we're currently only able to ship this scratcher within the contiguous US. If you are interested in purchasing a scratcher and live elsewhere please get in touch so we can offer you a quote.

name: Cat Teepee
description:
Most cats enjoy a good hiding place. Whether its under a blanket, in a closet or paper bag -- there's no denying that our little buddies will do just about anything to carve out some personal space for themselves.

We've been dying to bring our hand-printed fabric into the home on a scale that would serve more prominently in the design scheme. We came up with this little number and are really excited about how cute and sophisticated it is. We print the canvas and sew it in our Long Island City studio -- its composed of organic cotton canvas, muslin and wood.  The kitty jones cat teepee is a conversation piece, a decorative object and most importantly -- a little slice of solitude for the most important member of the household.

name: mini mice (set of 3)
description: These little mice, made of hand-printed organic cotton canvas, are perfect for cats who like to fetch or the kitty who prefers a more dainty toy. Filled with cotton and a hefty helping of catnip, they'll be an instant favorite. The tail is made of jute cord. We design all of our fabrics, and print them ourselves, using water based ink.

name: kitty jones kitty crafts
description:
kitty jones kitty crafts: beautifully designed projects for a cat-friendly home. 

A great gift for you or that crafty person in your life.

This book is full of stylish toys and accessories for cats and their people. Divided into two sections, the first contains items that your cat is sure to love -- whether it's a catnip toy or a scratching post. Part two is full of decorative projects for the home and includes a Victorian silhouette project and a stuffed animal for your (other) best friend. The projects vary in level of difficulty so whether you want a big project or something to do on a rainy afternoon you'll definitely find something fun and stylish to sink your crafty teeth into. And best of all -- no matter which project you choose -- your kitty will most certainly appreciate the effort.

Projects include:

for your cat:

catnip mouse
grass planter
catnip stick
bed
catnip fishing rod
scratch pad
scratching post

for your home:

bookends
easy decoupage
victorian silhouette
stamp project (for fabric and paper)
placemat
stuffed animal

templates included!

Also available online and at bookstores everywhere. 

ISBN: 978-1-935548-21-8
paperback with flaps/ 8 x 10/
96 pages / 18.95/ 4-color
September 2012
Publisher: One Peace Books
Distributor: SCB Distributors

For wholesale information please see our "about" page.

name: waxed canvas placemat
description: This waxed-organic-cotton-canvas placemat is a natural, eco-friendly and water-resistant alternative to petroleum based laminates. We print the canvas in our Long Island CIty studio and wax it, by hand, using pharmaceutical grade beeswax.
